post_title: FS or trade T206 Crawford Ghost
post_content:
Hey all,
I do love this card but doesn’t really fit my stuff. So looking to sell for $450 or trade toward a graded 3~4.5 AB 460 HOFer or an Old Mill HOFer portrait in the 3~4.5 range. Would also consider raw HOFers or SL guys in G-VG range.

If a cash buyer comes before a trade is ironed out, that takes it, but would prefer trading.



Thanks,
Bob
